relationships.description: Russian forces advanced into Pokrovsk in September 2025 and seized 67.63 percent of the town as of December 2025
Russian forces enabled advances in Oleksandrivka direction and intensified efforts toward it in Fall 2025
Russian forces enabled advances in Hulyaipole direction and began operating within the town in early December 2025
Rubikon Center for Advanced Unmanned Technologies is an elite drone operator unit of Russian forces
Russian forces seized Siversk in December 2025
Russian forces operate in Serebryanske forest area to interdict Ukrainian GLOCs
Russian forces prioritized seizing Donetsk Oblast in 2025
Russian forces attempted to establish buffer zone in northern Sumy Oblast but failed
Russian forces attempted to establish buffer zone in northern Kharkiv Oblast
Pavlo Palisa stated Russia's failed intentions to seize Donetsk and Luhansk oblasts
Russian forces attempted to push into southeastern Dnipropetrovsk Oblast in 2025
Russian forces seized Velyka Novosilka in late January 2025
Russian sabotage groups infiltrated toward Dobropillya in August 2025 but were repelled
Russian forces conducted offensive operations northeast of Slovyansk
Russian forces advanced into Lyman in December 2025
Russian forces completed seizure of Toretsk by August 1, 2025
Russian forces began efforts to seize Kostyantynivka in October 2025
Russian forces pushed Ukrainian forces out of Kursk Oblast in March 2025
Russian forces opened offensive toward Velykyi Burluk in July 2025
Russian forces intensified efforts to seize Kupyansk in Summer 2025 but failed
Russian forces conducted operations in Zaporizhia Oblast
Russian forces attempted advances toward Orikhiv but were constrained
Russian military command intends to advance on Zaporizhzhia City
Russian forces fought for 18 months to seize Pokrovsk-Myrnohrad area
Robert Brovdi is the Commander of Ukrainian Unmanned Systems Forces
Ukrainian Unmanned Systems Forces struck Russian oil depot in Rovenky
Ukrainian forces struck positions of Russian Rubikon-D Spetsnaz unit
Ukrainian forces struck 74th Motorized Rifle Brigade near Selydove
Ukrainian forces struck unit belonging to 41st Combined Arms Army
Ukrainian forces struck units belonging to Central Military District
Ukrainian forces struck 589th Motorized Rifle Regiment near Selydove
Ukrainian forces struck unit belonging to 27th Motorized Rifle Division
Ukrainian forces struck unit belonging to 2nd Combined Arms Army
Ukrainian forces struck substations in occupied Melitopol
Ukrainian forces struck substations in occupied Molochansk
Ukrainian forces struck base of Russian 92nd River Boat Brigade near Olenivka
Ukrainian forces struck 92nd River Boat Brigade near Olenivka
Ukrainian forces struck Russian ammunition depot near Blizhnye
Ukrainian forces struck Russian ammunition depot near Siatel
Ukrainian forces struck Russian units near Selydove
Ukrainian forces struck targets in Crimea
Ukrainian forces struck targets in occupied Luhansk Oblast
Ukrainian forces struck targets in occupied Donetsk Oblast
Ukrainian forces struck targets in occupied Zaporizhia Oblast
Russian defense industrial base supports Russian forces with production
Russian defense industrial base imports critical components from People's Republic of China
Russian defense industrial base relies on North Korea for KN-23 missiles and labor
Russian defense industrial base has Shahed-producing factory in Republic of Tatarstan
Russian forces are engaged in military conflict with Ukrainian forces
Ukrainian forces are engaged in military conflict with Russian forces
